We Aren’t in the Throes of a ‘Sex Crisis’—But Men’s Rights Activists Think We Are

A new study finds that more young people than ever aren’t having sex, especially men

Rolling Stone
Apr 2

By EJ Dickson

According to a specific demographic of straight men on the internet, America is in the throes of a crisis — and it has nothing to do with opioid…
title: We Aren’t in the Throes of a ‘Sex Crisis’—But Men’s Rights Activists Think We Are
content: We Aren’t in the Throes of a ‘Sex Crisis’—But Men’s Rights Activists Think We AreA new study finds that more young people than ever aren’t having sex, especially menRolling StoneBlockedUnblockFollowFollowingApr 2In a culture dominated by dating apps, where the ratio is skewed against men in many cities, and where women are increasingly delaying marriage in favor of professional and sexual self-empowerment, it’s not particularly shocking that some men may be getting the short end of the stick.
